messages.title: NHS Crisis
messages.content: Our NHS is in crisis. Only the Labour will end the Tory NHS crisis with a Â£26 billion real terms healthcare funding boost to provide quality care, recruit thousands of staff, rebuild and refurbish facilities and provide modern state-of-the-art facilities.

messages.title: Nottinghamshire Police Numbers Cut
messages.content: Under the Tories 2,000 police officers have been axed and recorded crime is at the highest since records began in 2001. 83 police community support officers were cut. Tory police cuts are devastating our communities and leaving them completely exposed.

messages.title: Rushcliffe Green Summit
messages.content: Many people in Rushcliffe have been inspired with Labour's existing Green New Deal. As your MP I will commit to organising a Rushcliffe Green Summit with everyone in our community and stakeholders and contribute to making Rushcliffe greener, cleaner and more sustainable.

messages.title: Why We're Supporting Cheryl
messages.content: Cheryl has been campaigning tirelessly in Rushcliffe for a long time. She has listened to the concerns...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Public vote on any Brexit deal, where I will campaign to remain.
Increase funding for the NHS with more nurses and doctors.
A green industrial Revolution creating 400,000 jobs.
Free school meals for all primary school children.
Keep the Winter Fuel Allowance, free TV licences and bus passes.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour can beat the Tories in Rushcliffe. A vote for the Liberal Democrats is one step closer to a Tory MP who has no links to Rushcliffe.

issues.brexitEurope: Public vote on any Brexit deal, where I will campaign to remain.

leaflet.personalStatement: It is time for real change in Rushcliffe - we have a once in a lifetime chance to rebuild and transform. We are ready - are you with us?

endorsements.endorser: Cllr David Mellen, Nottingham City Council Leader / Previous Candidate for Rushcliffe
